term.title: substrate

item.text: The chemical entity whose conversion to a product or products is catalysed by one or several enzymes. A solution or dry mixture containing all ingredients which are necessary for the growth of a microbial culture or for product formation.

The chemical entity whose conversion to a product or products is catalysed by one or several enzymes. A solution or dry mixture containing all ingredients which are necessary for the growth of a microbial culture or for product formation.
Component in the nutrient medium, supplying the organisms with carbon (C-substrate), nitrogen (N-substrate), etc.
